title: Phone number invalid in Clash
body:
The client keeps saying that my phone number is invalid. I've tried everything I could but it still doesn't work.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
If your phone number is returning an invalid error it might be because of your carrier or plan.

Some types of phones and carriers aren't eligible for SMS verification because they're easy to spoof. Internet phone numbers like Google Voice, for example, won't work as verification.

We could definitely do better with the error messaging around these instances.  "Invalid" doesn't tell you much, so we will try to improve these errors to make it more clear what the issue is.  Apologies for the inconvenience!
